title: It's So Good it Zooms by too Fast!
review: This movie was great, it felt like I was in a car the whole movie! On a serious note - This movie is well worth a watch, an epic rivalry, awesome acting and brilliant directing. You'll be wanting to go 150 on the highway after you watch this movie!

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Tarantino Tantalised Everybody's Tastebuds.
review: A bit slow at the start of the movie but it is all forgiven in the last half hour. The bits in between were great, I enjoyed the old movie setting in some parts. The action sequence at the end of the film was fantastic, Tarantino really knows his fight scenes and this was no exception. In conclusion: movie good hippy bad.

title: A Uniquely Creative Western Movie
review: I first watched this movie as a child in 2012, upon my second viewing I can properly appreciate all that Rango has to offer. It is really a homage to old western films, a new take on them if you will. It is especially fun to notice that some of the scenes in the movie reference other films such as Star Wars. Worth a watch.

title: It Deserves all the Praise it Gets.
review: This is a truly 'Fantastic' film and does deserve all the praise it gets, the meticulous hours of work that must of gone into this has fully paid off in this 1hr and 28min picture. Everything from the colours to the humor is well thought out. Highly recommend.

title: Pretty Cool Sequences in the Film
review: I enjoyed the film for the most part, had some complaints about some of the science however this is a sci-fi movie. Some of the sequences were very well done especially near the end of the film.
